text: The Directorate General for Civil Aviation"Directorate General for Energy and Climate ." Ministry of Ecology, Energy, Sustainable Development and Sea. 15 (15/16). Retrieved on 6 March 2011. (, DGAC) is the French civil aviation authority. It is located in Paris."Implantation de nos services à Paris." Direction Générale de l'Aviation Civile. Retrieved on 4 July 2009."La DGAC accepte de surveiller le bruit des avions." Le Parisien. 4 April 2002. Retrieved on 29 October 2009 In 2013, DGAC starts with the ENAC the consulting company France Aviation Civile Services. ==Related pages== * Ingénieur des études et de l'exploitation de l'aviation civile * Technicien supérieur des études et de l'exploitation de l'aviation civile ==References== ==Further reading== * Direction Générale de l'Aviation Civile Category:Aviation in France
title: Directorate General for Civil Aviation (France)
